mapper.select: SELECT cps.college_id AS collegeId, MIN(cps.created_time) AS minCreatedTime, r.name_en AS rankNameEn, o.name_en as departmentNameEn FROM cid_profile_snapshots cps INNER JOIN "rank" r ON cps.substantive_rank_id = r.id inner join organisation o on cps.org_id = o.id WHERE cps.college_id = #{collegeId} GROUP BY cps.college_id, cps.substantive_rank_id, r.name_en, o.name_en
